text: Penginapannya rapi, bersih, suasana tenang, pelayannya ramah dan banyak membantu. Lokasi cukup dekat ke beberapa obyek wisata. kalau saya ke bandung lagi mungkin saya akan menginap lagi di sini.

The inn only 7minutes distance by walking, I got a clean and very comfortable. Not recommended for elder, big sized traveler or traveler with toddler because the bed is on 2nd floor and they have high stair steps. Their bathroom kinda clean, but small and the shower didn't go well (but they give us toilet wasser).  So far, i feel very satisfied and comfortable stayed there, thank you for the friendliness ^^

Short escape. Dan krn pulang kemaleman. Iseng coba airy wijaya kusuma 10 sama suami. Lokasi cukup strategis dari jl. Rs fatmawati, cilandak, pd. Labu, tb simatupang dan sekitarnya... sekitar juga banyak warung2. Really feels like home, bisa parkir mobil. Mas2 juga cukup ramah dan mau bantu bawain koper ke lantai 2 dgn naik tangga. Kamar kecil tapi cukup nyaman, bau furnish baru, disediakan sajadah. Ac dan kasur cukup nyaman untuk tidur. Sayang kamar mandi saluran nya tergenang dan lama mengalir. Overall worth woth the price.

Fasilitas yang dijamin Airy vs kenyataan:
1. TV: chanel banyak, tp tdk ada remote
2. Free Wi-Fi: ada, tp koneksi sangat lambat bahkan utk aplikasi pengirim pesan pun tdk bs digunakan
3. AC: memuaskan
4. Comfy & clean bed: hanya 'clean'
5. Hot& cold shower: hanya 'cold'
6. Amenity kit: memuaskan
7. Free mineral water: memuaskan

Sangat kecewa dengan fasilitas hotel sudirman bogor. Hotel tidak layak dijadikan airy room karena standar airy tidak dipenuhi oleh hotel ini. Kekecewaan saya ketika bermalam di hotel sudirman bogor:
1. AC tidak ada angin dan sejuknya sama sekali
2. Kasur gatal, selimbut bau.
3. Toilet kotor, air berwarna keruh.
4. Colokan listrik putus.
Haduh parah

gada hot water. Ada bekas puntung rokok di, wastafel. kunci/ slot kamar mandi rusak.

This review is great if you are catching the ferry to Nusa Lembongan or the other islands. It is perfect to walk out the next morning and board the boats. No taxi, no luggage hassles.  But it is situated next to a fish restaurant and has its 'Airy' name must include the smell of fish and cooking seafood. Rooms 1, 2 and three without heaps of deodorant smell of fish. Room 24 has a great view and only has cooking smells. Don?? expect workable wifi, it needs an overhaul. I only found workable wifi twice late at night. The staff are friendly and helpful but they don?? have a solution for the wifi. It has a lovely court yard. Looks a tropical paradise.
